nodes.text: The Ermi Jedi was an ancient sect of the Jedi Order that hailed from the Outer Rim planet of Ermi. Because their lightsabers often contained multifaceted gems, stray energy tendrils would spiral off their blades. The Ermi Jedi wore distinctive white frocks with blue markings and armored plates decorated with organic designs on their chest and legs. By the time of the Clone Wars, ancient Ermi Jedi artifacts could still be purchased.
